data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Kishtwar, Jammu and Kashmir, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kishtwar, Jammu and Kashmir, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Kishtwar, Jammu and Kashmir, India so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.section_summary: On average, 8 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Kishtwar, Jammu and Kashmir, India.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, cause the 422 believers in Kishtwar to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 37,512 who are far from you in Kishtwar, Jammu and Kashmir, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Zargar (Muslim traditions) people. Make the Zargar (Muslim traditions) people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Kishtwar, Jammu and Kashmir, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Kishtwar, Jammu and Kashmir, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.section_summary:
the county of Kishtwar, Jammu and Kashmir, India has a population of 38,400.

We estimate Kishtwar has 422 people who might know Jesus, 466 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 37,512 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the county of Kishtwar, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.
